Title: Replace the Official Spotify Client With spotify-tui and spotifyd
Content:
I have an old Thinkpad X200 laptop and if there is one thing it doesn't like, its Electron apps that consume 30% of its RAM.

So I used a combination of two programs to replace the official Spotify client, spotify-tui and spotifyd, both of which are written in Rust.
